about_the_game:
Goblin Quest is an immersive fantasy sandbox with a nonlinear storyline.

Thus allowing you to play the story your way, with the player choice being our guiding gameplay mechanic.

After finding yourself in the border prison within the forest, you can escape into the Eben Hinderlands, where you start to build out your story.

From playing the hero who saves the lands, the chief who rules their people, the stronghold master, or the villain who desires world domination and everything in the middle.

Delve into Strongholds, fight against wildlife, raid people on the King’s Road, or wage war throughout the Eben.

All while discovering supporters who can aid you in multiple ways. Such as becoming a Chiefs, Right Hand, or bodyguard.

Upgrade your weapons, armor, and homes you unlock as you play the game.

Who will you save, enlist, or discover as you traverse the lands?

The world will adapt and respond to your actions.

You decide your fate.

content_descriptors.notes:
It's only started by the player only, no sexual acts or done without the player start them.

Including handjobs or missionary position at present.

There is no actions of extreme violence, graphic sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug/alcohol abuse, or self-harm, within the game.

The only thing that is shown is kidnapping of nude women, but outside the kidnapping nothing happens.

detailed_description:
Goblin Quest is an immersive fantasy sandbox with a nonlinear storyline.

Thus allowing you to play the story your way, with the player choice being our guiding gameplay mechanic.

After finding yourself in the border prison within the forest, you can escape into the Eben Hinderlands, where you start to build out your story.

From playing the hero who saves the lands, the chief who rules their people, the stronghold master, or the villain who desires world domination and everything in the middle.

Delve into Strongholds, fight against wildlife, raid people on the King’s Road, or wage war throughout the Eben.

All while discovering supporters who can aid you in multiple ways. Such as becoming a Chiefs, Right Hand, or bodyguard.

Upgrade your weapons, armor, and homes you unlock as you play the game.

Who will you save, enlist, or discover as you traverse the lands?

The world will adapt and respond to your actions.

You decide your fate.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Goblin Quest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7, Windows8, Windows8.1, Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Able to run 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Goblin Quest is an immersive fantasy sandbox with a nonlinear storyline. From playing the hero who saves the lands to the villain who destroys it, the world will adapt and respond to your actions. You decide your fate.
